player_skill.name: Scavenging
player_skill.description_key: Be the scrounge master and get faster at looting and gain a higher % chance for better loot. Gain skill by opening untouched loot containers. Level 5 unlocks the ability to scrap iron, brass, lead. Level 10 unlocks scrap iron tools and weapons. Level 15 unlocks the Blunderbuss. Level 20 unlocks Lockpicks.

perk.name: Quality Joe
perk.description_key: Adds 25, 50 or 100 quality points to found items. This perk can only be purchased. Level 2 unlocks the Combine Station where you can merge tools and weapons together to get better quality variants.

action_skill.name: Blunt Weapons
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with blunt weapons. Gain skill by using items from this group. Level 20 unlocks iron club. Level 30 unlocks barbed club. Level 40 unlocks spiked club.

action_skill.name: Blade Weapons
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with bladed weapons and harvest faster if applicable. Gain skill by using items from this group. Level 20 unlocks hunting knife. 30 unlocks machete. 50 unlocks scythe.

action_skill.name: Mining Tools
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage within mining tools and harvest resources faster. Level 10 unlocks shovel, hoe and weed cleaver. Level 20 unlocks iron pickaxe. Level 40 unlocks steel pickaxe.

action_skill.name: Construction Tools
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage and harvest faster with stone axe, hammer and sledgehammer . Level 20 unlocks hammer. Level 30 unlocks sledgehammer. Level 40 unlocks wrench.

action_skill.name: Axes
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with axes and harvest resources faster. Level 10 unlocks iron fireaxe. Level 20 unlocks steel fireaxe. Level 50 unlocks Combat Axe.

action_skill.name: Pistols
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with handguns and reduce the quality loss from repairs. Level up to 20 to be able to assemble pistols. Level 40 unlocks the magnum.

action_skill.name: Shotguns
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with spread weapons and reduce the quality loss from repairs. Level up to 15 to assemble a sawed off shotgun. Level up to 20 to be able to assemble a pump shotgun.them. Level 30 unlocks shotgun choke.

action_skill.name: Rifles
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with rifles and reduce the quality loss from repairs. Gain skill by using items from this group. Level up to 20 to be able to assemble hunting rifles. Level 40 unlocks the sniper rifle.

action_skill.name: Assault Rifles
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with assault weapons and reduce the quality loss from repairs. Level 20 unlocks unlocks the SMG. Level 40 unlocks Assault Rifle.

action_skill.name: Archery
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with bows and crossbows. Gain skill by using items from this group. Level 10 unlocks the wooden bow. Level 30 unlocks the crossbow. Level 50 unlocks the repeater crossbow.

perk.name: Master Archer
perk.description_key: Each level in perk raises your damage with bows and crossbows.

player_skill.name: Medicine
player_skill.description_key: Get more health from topical and consumable remedies. Gain skill by using items from this group. Learn new recipes every 5 levels until level 40.

crafting_skill.name: Science
crafting_skill.description_key: At level 15 and 20 in this skill you unlock many various new recipes. Level 80 unlocks steel polish.

crafting_skill.name: Tailoring
crafting_skill.description_key: Craft plant fiber or cloth clothing faster and at better quality. Decrease repair penalties and get more from repair kits. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group. Level 5 lets you craft a sewing kit which is used in the Armory for various armors.

crafting_skill.name: Leatherworking
crafting_skill.description_key: Level this by crafting leather. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group. Level 15 unlocks leather and tanning rack.

crafting_skill.name: Armor Smithing
crafting_skill.description_key: Craft armor faster and at better quality while repairing it more efficiently. Gain skill by crafting and repairing these items. Every 10 levels unlocks a new tier of armor until Steel Armor.

crafting_skill.name: Mechanical
crafting_skill.description_key: This skill levels the more you work with electronics and mechanical gear. Level 10/15/25 unlocks the chainsaw/nailgun/auger. Level 30 unlocks gear mechanisms and mechanical parts. Level 50 unlocks minibike.

crafting_skill.name: Traps
crafting_skill.description_key: Learn how to craft improvised traps. Every ten levels unlocks a new tier. Level 20 unlocks explosive traps. Level 30 unlocks fire traps.

crafting_skill.name: Masonry
crafting_skill.description_key: Learn how to build with stone. Level 5 unlocks clay bowl and plate. Level 20 unlocks cement mixer and cobblestone blocks. Level 30 unlocks brick. Level 50 unlocks cement.

crafting_skill.name: Blacksmith
crafting_skill.description_key: Level this skill up by crafting various items and blocks in the forge. Levels 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 50 and 80 all unlock new recipes.

crafting_skill.name: Carpentry
crafting_skill.description_key: Level this skill up to unlock more wood-related recipes such as woodframes and carpenter kits. Level 10 unlocks woodframe crafting.

crafting_skill.name: Cooking
crafting_skill.description_key: The higher your skill in cooking the faster you can craft meals. You also gradually unlock new cooking recipes as you level.

player_skill.name: Barter
player_skill.description_key: Reduce the cost of goods and sell them for more Dukes by improving this skill. Level 20 unlocks the merchant deliver box.

perk.name: Gun Rocket
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to assemble a rocket launcher.

perk.name: Electric Lights
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft electric lights at the decor artisan station.

perk.name: Plumbing
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft plumbing kits to repair sinks for a clean source of drinking water.

perk.name: Oven Repair
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft Oven Repair kits to repair ovens for cooking without needing fuel.

perk.name: Security
perk.description_key: Max this perk to learn how to craft very durable gun safes, advanced doors, drawbridges and hidden walls.

perk.name: Skinning Knife
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a skinning knife. These knives are useful for getting extra hides from skinning animals.

perk.name: Butcher Knife
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a butcher knife. These knives are useful for getting extra meat from animals.
